Welcome to your Applicant Status Page! From this page, you can check the status of your application, make your enrollment deposit and receive important information pertaining to required forms and processes throughout the application cycle. If you don't remember getting an email with instructions on creating your account or if you have any problems logging in, please
To log in, please enter your email address and password.
The login page will open in a new window. After logging in you can close it and return to this page.

You're just one step away from applying to the University of Lynchburg! This form is for students applying for undergraduate, graduate, and DMSc programs. (Students applying for admission to the Doctor of Physical Therapy (DPT) or Master of Physical Therapy program,
.) High school students who are taking dual enrollment courses while in high school should
Questions? We're happy to help! Call us at 434.544.8300 (M-F, 8:30 a.m.-5 p.m.), or email
. We look forward to working with you through your college application process.

Note: We recommend using an email account that is not associated with your school system, as those email servers typically block many of our emails. If possible, use a Gmail, Yahoo, Hotmail, or other email account to start your log in.

We’re here to help you find and begin your graduate program.
Come meet us and learn about graduate programs at Lynchburg.
Financial aid at the University of Lynchburg
serious about earning your graduate degree; we’re serious about making sure you can afford it.
Our graduate programs are the key to the next phase in your career.
Do we have graduate assistantships at Lynchburg? You bet. You can work in our art gallery, our offices, our residence halls, at Historic Sandusky, with our athletic teams, and other places.
Learn more about graduate tuition and fees.

Changing lives is what we do best.
51 majors, 62 minors, and faculty who put you first.
Make an impact in the next level of your career.
Meet the next University of Lynchburg president.
We stick together. We help each other get to where we want to go.
At University of Lynchburg, dreamers become thinkers, doers, solvers, travelers, influencers. We help you become more of who you are, and more of who you want to be.
Our commitment to liberal arts prepares students with tools for personal growth and development.
Lynchburg shaped me into the person I am today. I've learned to be more independent and embrace who I am.
A lot of time and effort goes into creating high-impact learning experiences for Lynchburg students.
Our approach to learning empowers you to deal with complexity, diversity, and change — necessary parts of 21st-century life.
